titles.title: AWARE Act

To direct the Attorney General to acquire data, for each calendar year, about sexual offenses, including rape, that occur aboard any mode of transportation over which the Federal Government exercises jurisdiction.
Assaults on Water and Aviation Reporting Enforcement Act of 2019
AWARE Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary:
Assaults on Water and Aviation Reporting Enforcement Act of 2019 or the AWARE Act
This bill directs the Department of Justice to collect and publish data about sexual offenses that occur aboard any mode of transportation over which the federal government exercises jurisdiction.
